name: Ruby Runner (odencoladerg)
description:
CW: Object Vore

A silly runner game about eating coins I made in a single night. You play as the dragon Ruby running across a desert full of bountiful treasure ready to devour while avoiding big rocks. The more coins you eat the heavier you get, so be careful about those jumps when you're full.

Controls: Just click! The game automatically pauses when you move your cursor off the screen.

You can even play it on your phone!

Oh, and one last thing... Don't eat every coin you see.
